pullrequest.title: Quick fix for config errors after qtutils 2 changes

content.raw: By the way, one time phil was asking why he was not added as a reviewer when the default reviewers are him and me. This is a bug in bitbucket - default reviewers are based on the source fork, not on the destination, and when @PhyNerd forked this repo, it must have been before we set default reviewers. Silly, but explains why the reviewers aren't always what we expect.
content.html: By the way, one time phil was asking why he was not added as a reviewer when the default reviewers are him and me. Silly, but explains why the reviewers aren't always what we expect.
